reuters.title: VANGUARD TECHNOLOGIES <VTI> ACQUIRES COMPANY
reuters.body: Vanguard Technologies International Inc said it acquired 100 pct of the stock of <Diversified Data Corp>. Diversified, and its wholly-owned subsidiary, TECHPRO Corp, have current revenues from operations of approximately four mln dlrs, Vanguard said. The acquisition was for cash, but the amount was not disclosed. Reuter 
